roleset.name: put up with, the act of tolerating

example.name: arg 0
example.text: His tolerance only extends so far.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to tolerate.01-v. Tolerate is a member of VN classes admire-31.2 and allow-64. Tolerate is a member of FN class Tolerating. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: But I also did a no tolerance on whining campaign and put him in a t/o chair every single time he whined.
